configurable string shopifyServiceUrl = ?;

fields.source:
message: { subject: "Welcome to Our Store", importance: "normal", body: { "contentType": "HTML", "content": string `

Hi There,

Welcome to Our Store


What happens next?
Keep an eye on your inbox as well be sending you the best tips for [product/service].
Want to get more out of Our Store?
visit our store at Shopify

` }, toRecipients: recepients, attachments: [attachment] }
